          <title>
            <string language="en">The effects of atmospheric pollution on a city.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Effekte der atmosphärischen Verunreinigung 
auf einer Stadt.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les effets de la pollution atmosphérique sur une

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os efeitos da poluição atmosférica em uma

            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli effetti di inquinamento atmosferico su una

            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα αποτελέσματα της ατμοσφαιρικής ρύπανσης σε μια

            <string language="x-mt-es">Los efectos de la contaminación atmosférica en 
una ciudad.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive animation which demonstrates the effects of atmospheric polutants on a city environment</string>
